707334f-b.text:
Waverly Avenue, north from near Aulton ftreet, across Gates avenue. View 2 shows the houses Nos. 467-257 extending to Gates Avenue. View 3 is north from Gates Avenue.All buildings are on the east
eide of the avenue.
P. L. Sperr  September 28, 1941
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 1-3
707334f-b.folder: Waverly Ave. & Fulton St., Brooklyn, NY
